file.name: endotypes_openapi.yml
file.content: openapi: 3.0.0 servers: - url: 'https://endotypes.renci.org/v1' info: description: >- NIH Endotypes API - Refer to User Manual on how to use the API. version: 1.0.0 title: NIH Endotypes API termsOfService: None contact: name: Hong Yi url: 'https://github.com/renci/nih-endotypes-api' email: hongyi@renci.org license: name: MIT url: 'http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT' tags: - name: patient - name: endotype - name: query ## deprecate this registry entry? # - name: translator paths: /endotypes: post: summary: Get list of endotypes based on input as a POST request description: | list of endotypes based on input @input - JSON object with required input @return - JSON object that returns array of predicted endotypes operationId: endotypes_post responses: '200': description: OK content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/response_200' '400': description: Invalid parameter '404': description: No endotypes found '500': description: Server error x-swagger-router-controller: controllers.default_controller requestBody: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/input' required: true components: schemas: exposure: type: object properties: value: type: number format: float example: 2 units: type: string example: '' exposure_type: type: string example: pm25 visit: type: object properties: time: type: string example: '2017-10-12 21:12:29' lat: type: string example: '20' lon: type: string example: '20' visit_type: type: string example: INPATIENT pattern: ^(INPATIENT|OUTPATIENT|EMERGENCY|inpatient|outpatient|emergency)$ x-regex: ^(INPATIENT|OUTPATIENT|EMERGENCY|inpatient|outpatient|emergency)$ x-modifiers: [] icd_codes: type: string example: 'ICD9:V12,ICD9:E002' description: >- comma-separated standard ICD-9 or ICD-10 codes associated with the visit exposures: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/exposure' input: type: object properties: date_of_birth: type: string example: '2017-10-04' race: type: string example: '1' description: | race code ranged from 1 to 6 with the following mapping: 1: WHITE OR CAUCASIAN 2: BLACK OR AFRICAN AMERICAN 3: AMERICAN INDIAN OR ALASKA NATIVE 4: ASIAN 5: NATIVE HAWAIIAN OR OTHER PACIFIC ISLANDER 6: OTHER/HISPANIC sex: type: string example: M pattern: ^(F|M|f|m)$ x-regex: ^(F|M|f|m)$ x-modifiers: [] model_type: type: string example: M0 pattern: '^[M|m][0-9]$' x-regex: '^[M|m][0-9]$' x-modifiers: [] visits: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/visit' endotypes_period: type: object properties: start_time: type: string end_time: type: string response_200: type: object properties: output: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/response_200_output' response_200_output: properties: endotype_id: type: string endotype_description: type: string endotype_evidence: type: string periods: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/endotypes_period' type: object
